text: Hangome ki Muso [on] muddat [-i muajjan]-ro ʙa pojon rasond va hamrohi xonavodaas [az Madjan ʙa suji Misr] harakat kard, [nogahon dar torikii saʙ] az suji [kuhi] Tur otase did, ʙa xonavodaas guft: «Biisted, ki man otase [az dur] didam. Sojad xaʙare az on ʙarojaton ʙijovaram jo su'lai otase [ʙijovaram], to garm saved»
